name: Dos Flyer
description:
A DOS Inspired Flight simulator based on the old Microsoft flight sim games

There are 3 Different Modes

Small city and islands{Basic Premade maps}

Earth{Scaled down heightmap of earth for you to fly aroun, Takes about 30-45 minutes from one end to the other you spawn in the middle of the us}

Proc{infinite Procedurally generated Map} 

Made for Dos Fall jam 2020

WSAD for control

Page up to increase throttle page down to decrease 

z and x for yaw 

c to change between the 2 cam views 

Make sure to read the readme
